reviewText: For those specifically wanting to watch Secret World of OG, you need to press " play all " on the Secret World of OG and it will play the whole three parts in their entirety. If you press play part 1, part 2 part 3  they are heavily condensed version of the whole show not the same version as pressing " play all " on the menu . If you ready my review on the Secret World of OG single disc I addressed the issue.

If you are buying this for The Secret World of Og, don't bother. The original 3-part 70 minute cartoon is severely and poorly edited down to a mere 25 minutes. The box boasts complete 3-part cartoon with original soundtrack. There was hardly any music at all. Very, very disappointed.
i've been looking for this dvd movie since i saw it in i don't know when say 90's and when i final found it thank you it brings back childhood memories
